verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Everything to Me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I grew up in Sunday school

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I memorized the Golden rule

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And how Jesus came to set a sinner free

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: I know the story inside out

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: And I can tell you all about

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: The path that led Him up to Calvary

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
But ask me why He loves me
And I don't know what to say

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: but I'll never be the same

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: Because he changed my life when He became

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: Everything to me, He's more than a story

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: More than words on a page of history

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: He's the air that I breath, the water I thirst for

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: And the ground beneath my feet

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: He's everything, everything to me

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: We're living in uncertain times

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: And more and more I find that

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: I'm aware of just how fragile life can be

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: I want to tell the world I’ve found

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: A love that turned my life around

verse.name: v21
verse.lines: They need to know that they can taste and see

verse.name: v22
verse.lines: Now everyday I'm praying

verse.name: v23
verse.lines: Just to give my heart away,

verse.name: v24
verse.lines: I want to live for Jesus

verse.name: v25
verse.lines: So that someone else might see that He is

verse.name: v26
verse.lines: He's everything

verse.name: v27
verse.lines: And looking back over my life at the end

verse.name: v28
verse.lines: I'll go to meet you saying,

verse.name: v29
verse.lines: “You've been everything to me,

verse.name: v30
verse.lines: You're more than a story

verse.name: v31
verse.lines: You're the air that I breath, the water I thirst for

verse.name: v32
verse.lines: You're everything

verse.name: v33
verse.lines: Everything to me

verse.name: v34
verse.lines: Everything to me...
